Review_text: I bought it in April 2023 and started using from October 2023. It did a good job, however it stopped working since December 2023. It used to stop intermittent evrry few seconds and one fine day it to totally stopped rotating.

I have been using this product since 8 December 2021, once a day. The two AAA alcaline batteries last just about 3 weeks for this once a day use; so, it is expensive to use this toothbrush. The product is just ok. As for the results, I didn't see any difference between this one and a non-electric toothbrush. I have two major problems: (i) I travel a lot in connection with my work but it is difficult to carry along this toothbrush because the manufacturer (Colgate) didn't think of including a storage case; the product just came in a paper carton; and (ii) I cannot find a replacement head for this particular toothbrush on Amazon.in or in other websites. Therefore, once the initial head becomes unusable, I am afraid, the entire toothbrush becomes useless. Colgate should have cautioned its customers appropriately.

Product is authentic and works fine.Basic version of electric brush. Only one control which is the Power ON and OFFIf switched ON, will run for 2 minutes and automatically switches OFF.Does the basic cleaning but not efficient like regular manual brushing.I could feel some areas not properly cleaned, that too at the front visible teeth, after 2 X Brushings of 2 minsProduct package was slightly damaged, but not a big issue.

Don't waste your money on this stupid useless thing masquerading as a power toothbrush.
